Articles.Content:
![O0VKp6P.jpg](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/O0VKp6P.jpg)

Let's make a semi-official political map of Kerbin. Not just some .png with lines drawn on it in photoshop; a full-blown, high-quality, 16384x8192 digital map. 

I'd like you guys to help me come up with stuff;

Countries

Cities

Cultures/Cultural history

Governments

1000-2000 years of political history

Names of physical landmarks (Mountains, Oceans, Continents, etc.)

Please do not name anything after the Kerman brothers. They are far too recent in Kerbin's history to have any major landmarks named after them. Are there any landforms on Earth named after Neil Armstrong or Yuri Gagarin? No. 

The image above is what I have so far, which I am currently working on in Qgis.

Countries: Some parody of the nordic countries, especially Sweden. Like, viking culture, government: Odin, 1000-2000 years of history: They raided, and raided another place, then raided a little more, landmarks: Valhalla, Kebnekaise, Karlskrona etc. 

Just what popped into my head. Just a suggestion.

This sort of claiming of territory has a tendency to turn into nasty arguments on the forum, so please keep in mind that we've had to make a rule against "role playing" ([2.2.j](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-October-27th-2013)), and do not get overly invested in the game.

> 
> Countries: Some parody of the nordic countries, especially Sweden. Like, viking culture, government: Odin, 1000-2000 years of history: They raided, and raided another place, then raided a little more, landmarks: Valhalla, Kebnekaise, Karlskrona etc. 
> Just what popped into my head. Just a suggestion.

Yes. I'm definitely going to have some analogues to real world countries, just like there are planets in the game that are analogues to real planets.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> This sort of claiming of territory has a tendency to turn into nasty arguments on the forum, so please keep in mind that we've had to make a rule against "role playing" ([2.2.j](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-October-27th-2013)), and do not get overly invested in the game.

Yeah, I'm going to define the borders myself, first, and then have the countries named.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T00:53:41Z" title="06/14/2015 12:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by Third\_OfFive**
Is there a chance you could make the massive crater a separate country?

> 
> Is there a chance you could make the massive crater a separate country?

Sure. I was thinking that most of that continent, stretching from the large desert in the east to the crater in the west, was once one massive country (much like the USSR), before it broke up into several smaller countries.

![mQWyEgo.jpg](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/mQWyEgo.jpg)

1: U.S.K.K. (United South Kolus Kerbals) (USA analogue) (yes, I stole this name)

2: Kopp

3: Sodgerbania

4: Kermenia (France/UK/Italy analogue)

5: ? (You decide)

6: Svekka (Germany analogue?)

7: ? (You decide)

8: ? (You decide)

9: ? (You decide)

Feel free to add your suggestions to add to/change any of the names on this list

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T01:10:24Z" title="06/14/2015 01:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by Third\_OfFive**
